title: Characteristic feature of the Chinese language

content.question:
You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you read and hear the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.

Choose ONE characteristic feature of the Chinese language (characters, tones, dialects, homophones, etc.). In your presentation, describe this characteristic feature of the Chinese language and explain its significance.
